features.featureTitle: Add a new teddy-bear-style cartoony sticker image as a static asset under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` using a sanitized filename (lowercase, hyphen-separated, no spaces/special characters), and ensure it is directly loadable via `/assets/generated/<filename>`.

Update `frontend/src/components/sections/QuizSection.tsx` to replace the current corner-sticker `` `src` (`/assets/generated/kawaii-valentines-stickers.dim_220x220.png`) with the new teddy-bear sticker asset path, in BOTH the quiz question card view and the quiz results card view, keeping the existing placement/responsive sizing/rotation and ensuring it does not block text or buttons.
